items.text: looks to hoick across the line, no timing. Rolls into the leg side.
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Jason Holder is going off the field. Looks like he did something to his hamstring a while ago. Kieran Powell the stand-in captain till Holder is back
items.text: flicks this yorker-length delivery to midwicket
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full and angling away, left alone.
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: right behind the line as he defends.
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: driven through the line to mid-off
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: shapes to scoop this, but toe-ends it to square leg. Had to get it a lot finer
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: superb use of this wrists to flick this between midwicket and mid-on. Pure timing
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: pulled away, but straight to Gayle at short midwicket.
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: This pair's previous highest in ODIs: 144. Their stand now worth 147
items.text: make that 150! Too short and sliding in, uses the pace to flick this behind square. Had to get it wide of short fine, which he did.
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.preText: Azman: "If Bangladesh loses today, it won't be because of slow batting or (maybe) poor bowling but it would be for the dot balls they have played out, which is way too many." -- For a side that couldn't buy a run in the Tests, got to say this has been a decent batting effort.
items.text: defended back to the bowler, good stop off his own bowling.
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: steps out and pulls this into the gap at deep square
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: steps out and chips this over extra cover.
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: right in the slot, belted over mid-off. One bounce to the ropes. The acceleration is coming, and they're doing it very well.
items.postText: Can they get past 250? Looking good at the moment. Can these two get to centuries? Looking good for those too. Akshay Gopalakrishnan is back after a calorie-light dinner to take you through for the rest of the innings. Mohammad Isam will finally have something to write about Bangladesh's decent batting on tour, I'd imagine.
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: length on leg, flicked to square leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: makes some room and slashes to point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: gets down for a big slog to a length ball and it bounces over
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short, wide, cut to deep backward point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: drops it in front of point and wants a single but is sent back
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length, tucked off the hips to deep backward square leg
items.postText: The players are cooling off for drinks. How Bangladesh have progressed after the last interval!
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText:
Bishoo to continue after the break.

Faiq: "They are coming from humiliating series defeat in tests. I don't know why so many complains regarding dot balls. Still I believe they can pull 270+ to make things interesting. "
items.text: slides it into the pads, poor delivery, nudged away to deep fine leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: drifts down the leg side and spins past the keeper's glove, leaving short fine to tidy up
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: another wide down the leg side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: leg-side lines, flicked through midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, spinning in, tucked behind square
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: presents the full face and punches with the spin to mid-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run
